contents.text: That is the weapon created by the ancient Goddess.

The sword that seals the darkness—that only the
chosen knight can wield against the Calamity Ganon.
Hrm?
Well, well...it's you.
You finally decided to return.
Better late than never.

After 100 years, I'd nearly given up
hope on seeing you again.
Even my patience has limits, you know...

That look on your face tells me that you have no
recollection of me, however.
I have watched over Hyrule since time immemorial.

Many have referred to me over the ages
as the Deku Tree.

Believe it or not...it was actually you who wielded
that sword 100 years ago.

As you are now, I cannot say whether you are 
worthy or not...

If you sought to free the sword in any sort of
weakened state, you would surely lose your life
where you stand.
Best of luck, young one...
Who is that...?
Did I doze off again?
But I must warn you to take extreme caution.

The sword stands as a test to anyone who would
dare attempt to possess it.

?
※As in 「Hm? What's going on?」
「Who is it?」
「Someone we know?」
*laughter*
*laughter*
Pulling out→Struggling voice
When pulling out right side→Cheering on 1 (Not too noisy)
The moment the hands leave the sword→takes damage
When pulling out right side→Cheering on 2 (Not too noisy)
Wobbling then falling down→Weak voice cries out then cut short
01 falls down→Tremble like "Kyuwawawa!"
Laughing voice as flying away
Laughing voice as flying away
When pulling out right side→Cheering on 3 (Not too noisy)
